Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Sheridan/Winthrop
ShortDescription: Southbound 151 Sheridan buses are rerouted via Devon, Broadway, Granville, Sheridan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr Sheridan/Winthrop

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Broadway, Granville, Sheridan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Winthrop.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.   (REVISED)
